title: CTC bug with multi-gpu training
body_html: I am using pytorch 0.5 compiled from github. but when I training a s2s network on multi-gpu with some AMAZING batchsize(2 gpu with batchsize greater than 128) using CTC loss, the loss will continue to rise!!!But when I choose a smaller batchsize, everything works well!
